```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(ggthemes)
```


```{r}
mack_verts <- read_csv(here::here("data", "AS00601.csv"))
mack_verts <- mack_verts |> janitor::clean_names()
head(mack_verts)
```
```{r}
mc_wt_5 <- mack_verts$weight[5]
mc_length_8_20 <- mack_verts$length1[8:20]
mc_dates <- c(mack_verts$sampledate)
```

```{r}
# subsetting out the giant salamanders
mc_salamanders <- mack_verts |> dplyr::filter(species == "DITE")
mc_salamanders
```

```{r}
salamander_size_plot <- ggplot(mc_salamanders, aes(x = length1, y = weight))+
  geom_point(color = "blue")+
  labs(title = "Salamander Snout Length vs. Weight", x = "Snout-Vent Length (mm)", y = "Weight (g)", caption = "Gregory, S.V. and I. Arismendi. 2020. Aquatic Vertebrate Population Study in Mack Creek, Andrews Experimental Forest, 1987 to present ver 14. Environmental Data Initiative. https://doi.org/10.6073/pasta/7c78d662e847cdbe33584add8f809165 (Accessed 2025-08-12).") +
  theme_solarized()
salamander_size_plot
```
